results.title: Dallas Police Targeted in Shooting Outside Headquarters
results.abstract: Multiple gunmen opened fire on officers outside the Dallas Police headquarters early Saturday morning.
results.byline: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and KATIE ROGERS

results.title: Arizona: Bees Pose Menace
results.abstract: A particularly aggressive strain of honeybee has been menacing parts of Arizona in recent weeks, with some people getting stung so many times that they have been hospitalized.

results.title: Texas: Most Shots at Melee Were Fired by Bikers, Police Say
results.abstract: Chief Brent Stroman said that only three of the nearly two dozen officers outside the Twin Peaks restaurant on May 17 fired their weapons following a dispute between rival biker gangs.

results.title: Ohio: Judge Approves Deal for Monitoring Cleveland Police
results.abstract: Judge Solomon Oliver Jr. of Federal District Court seemed especially interested in the section of the agreement that requires officers to receive more training on use of force and bias-free policing.

results.title: Jane Hart, Activist and Nearly an Astronaut, Dies at 93
results.abstract: Ms. Hart passed NASA’s astronaut training program while married to Philip A. Hart, a Democratic senator from Michigan who often found himself defending his wife’s liberal views.

results.title: Authorities Cite Plan by 3 Men to Aid ISIS
